oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Drawing by Pvt. James Long, Co. E, 5th Ky. Cav., USA
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Drawing of "Gen. Gearys Artillery Harassing the Rebels Across the River from Chattanooga" done in Chattanooga by Pvt. James Long, Co. E, 5th Ky. Cav. USA. Artist inscribes "J. Long 1863" in lower right hand corner. Long enlisted in the 5th Ky. Cav., USA in Burkesville, Ky in 1862. Records indicate that Long was captured Oct. 1, 1863 but he writes letters from Chattanooga as late as Oct. 17. Gen. Geary's command was part of the 20th Army Corps sent to the relief of Chattanooga in Oct. 1863.
